message: I'll give you 400k, you can't refuse!
You can't outbid me! I'll give you 300k
You think you can outbid me? I'll show you what's what!
You think 300k is the best you've got? I'll give you a better deal!
You're getting desperate, I can see it!
Desperate? Me? Never! I'll give you a better deal, but you have to be willing to take it!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you the same deal as before, but you have to take it this time!
You're not as generous as I thought, let's try again
Fine, you got me. You win this round, Bob!
